title: Happy New Year LWP Magic Touch
creator: APPLICITY

extendedInfo.description: A very Happy New Year 2013 to you all !! Celebrate with Champagne!!An interactive Live Wallpaper which will create water ripple effect on the screen with every touch. The most realistic water ripples makes you think that your screen is made of water.The wallpaper uses OpenGL graphics engine to render images.Champagne Glasses ripple in water is an absolute delight to watch. Instructions:Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers -> Happy New YearDisclaimer: We have found a new way to monetize this app. This app may generate ads in the notification bar.
